$interpreted: : Three years later...
Li Hwa: Very good, very good. You've picked out some great herbs. I see the last three years of training wasn't all in vain. Now what's next?
Lian Hsi: Heheh, picking medications is actually pretty fun. Next up... windsome flower!
Li Hwa: There's only one doctor who sells windsome flowers. Come.
Lian Hsi: Okay~!
Lian Hsi: Ma? That's my ma!
Li Hwa: Wait...
Lian Hsi: Ma! Wait for me!
Stingray Beast: Gwah!
Irritated Hoodlum: What the? Grow a pair of eyes, kid! Hand over everything you've got and maybe I'll consider letting this slip.
Excited Hoodlum: Hey, lookie here...
Irritated Hoodlum: A jellyfish? Scram, quit mucking in our mud, lady!
Irritated Hoodlum: Watch who you're messing with! Get outta here!
Lian Hsi: Are you okay, Ma?
Stingray Beast: ...I'm fine.
Li Hwa: ...Are you gonna keep running from us?
Stingray Beast: ......
Lian Hsi: Ma?
Lian Hsi: Ma... Are you all right?
Stingray Beast: I thought I made it clear when I moved away... But now you're back again...
Stingray Beast: Get away! Don't come any closer! Get away from me!!!
Li Hwa: (What?!)
Lian Hsi: What've you been doing the past three years, Ma? Why'd you never come and see me, not even once? What happened, Ma?
Stingray Beast: I left you with a letter... Didn't whoever found you tell you?
Lian Hsi: What letter? What's she mean, Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: Uhh...
Stingray Beast: I guess not. Then I'd better tell you myself.
Stingray Beast: ...I don't want you anymore.
Lian Hsi: Ma... What are you...?
Stingray Beast: I can't afford to pay for your meds, so just leave me alone. You've got someone else to take care of you now, so go away and don't ever come back.
Lian Hsi: ...Sister Li Hwa?
Stingray Beast: Besides, that sickness of yours is incurable, just as your father's was. You'll never be healed... so I'm washing my hands of you!
Lian Hsi: In...curable?
Stingray Beast: I abandoned you three years ago, and she's been hiding the truth from you all this time! Well then, I'll have to say it myself â€” I don't anything to do with you!
Lian Hsi: ......
Li Hwa: That's not what you wrote in the letter!
Li Hwa: I'm so sorry, Lian Hsi. I didn't want you to have to find out this way... Let's go back to Pearl Manor. I'll explain everything to you, okay?
Lian Hsi: Oh, I see... You're all lying to me!
Li Hwa: Lian Hsi...!
Stingray Beast: ...Thank you.
Li Hwa: Thank you? You really think you have any right to be thanking me?
Li Hwa: Three years ago, you left Lian Hsi to fend for herself at Lake Illumina. If we hadn't been passing through just then, she could easily have been eaten up, or worse...
Li Hwa: And you left her with a note asking for help, too. I really thought you were at least deserving of some sympathy!
Stingray Beast: I just wanted to find someone with a kind heart who could...
Li Hwa: For three whole years, we've wanted to find you and tell you how Lian Hsi's been doing. She's always saying how much she misses you and wishes she could see you...
Li Hwa: But now you say you "thought you made it clear", by abandoning her and moving away?
Stingray Beast: I just don't know how I could ever face her again... Maybe it's for the best if she lets her hopes die now...
Li Hwa: How can you be so cruel, if you really care for her like you say you do? Your words and deeds are telling two totally different stories!
Stingray Beast: ......
Li Hwa: Lian Hsi's a smart, caring girl. If you don't want to raise her, I'll do it myself, and cure her too!
Li Hwa: I'll make her happier than you ever could!
Li Hwa: Lian Hsi!

Model.Text: Three years later...
Very good, very good. You've picked out some great herbs. I see the last three years of training wasn't all in vain. Now what's next?
Heheh, picking medications is actually pretty fun. Next up... windsome flower!
There's only one doctor who sells windsome flowers. Come.
Okay~!
Ma? That's my ma!
Wait...
Ma! Wait for me!
Gwah!
What the? Grow a pair of eyes, kid! Hand over everything you've got and maybe I'll consider letting this slip.
Hey, lookie here...
A jellyfish? Scram, quit mucking in our mud, lady!
Watch who you're messing with! Get outta here!
Are you okay, Ma?
...I'm fine.
...Are you gonna keep running from us?
Ma?
Ma... Are you all right?
I thought I made it clear when I moved away... But now you're back again...
Get away! Don't come any closer! Get away from me!!!
(What?!)
What've you been doing the past three years, Ma? Why'd you never come and see me, not even once? What happened, Ma?
I left you with a letter... Didn't whoever found you tell you?
What letter? What's she mean, Li Hwa?
Uhh...
I guess not. Then I'd better tell you myself.
...I don't want you anymore.
Ma... What are you...?
I can't afford to pay for your meds, so just leave me alone. You've got someone else to take care of you now, so go away and don't ever come back.
...Sister Li Hwa?
Besides, that sickness of yours is incurable, just as your father's was. You'll never be healed... so I'm washing my hands of you!
In...curable?
I abandoned you three years ago, and she's been hiding the truth from you all this time! Well then, I'll have to say it myself â€” I don't anything to do with you!
That's not what you wrote in the letter!
I'm so sorry, Lian Hsi. I didn't want you to have to find out this way... Let's go back to Pearl Manor. I'll explain everything to you, okay?
Oh, I see... You're all lying to me!
Lian Hsi...!
...Thank you.
Thank you? You really think you have any right to be thanking me?
Three years ago, you left Lian Hsi to fend for herself at Lake Illumina. If we hadn't been passing through just then, she could easily have been eaten up, or worse...
And you left her with a note asking for help, too. I really thought you were at least deserving of some sympathy!
I just wanted to find someone with a kind heart who could...
For three whole years, we've wanted to find you and tell you how Lian Hsi's been doing. She's always saying how much she misses you and wishes she could see you...
But now you say you "thought you made it clear", by abandoning her and moving away?
I just don't know how I could ever face her again... Maybe it's for the best if she lets her hopes die now...
How can you be so cruel, if you really care for her like you say you do? Your words and deeds are telling two totally different stories!
Lian Hsi's a smart, caring girl. If you don't want to raise her, I'll do it myself, and cure her too!
I'll make her happier than you ever could!
Lian Hsi!
